name: part_001
file: tmp_【#沙花叉クロヱ生誕LIVE】シャチ爆誕！初ゲストあり！【沙花叉クロヱ⧸ホロライブ】 [_rgeHcQu0Tc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe performs the emotional finale of her song 'Love Letter' on a stage with multiple screens.
A transition video plays featuring cinematic shots of Sakamata Chloe in various environments before the next song begins.
Sakamata Chloe performs 'Hana no Tou' (Flower Tower) on stage with a backdrop of a colorful cityscape and ocean visuals.

subtitles.original: ...一緒に
subtitles.english: ...together,

subtitles.original: こんなたくさんの気持ち
subtitles.english: All of these many feelings,

subtitles.original: ぎゅっと詰め込んだ想い
subtitles.english: My tightly packed feelings,

subtitles.original: ちゃんと伝えられたかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I was able to convey them properly.

subtitles.original: ああ ちょっとだけ不安だけど
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm just a little bit anxious,

subtitles.original: きっと届いてくれたよね
subtitles.english: But I'm sure they reached you, right?

subtitles.original: 全部私の素直な言葉だから
subtitles.english: Because they're all my honest words.

subtitles.original: もしもあなたに出会えてなかったらなんて
subtitles.english: If I had never met you,

subtitles.original: 思うだけで怖いほど大好きなんだ
subtitles.english: The mere thought scares me, that's how much I love you.

subtitles.original: 受け取ってどうか私の想いを
subtitles.english: Please, accept my feelings.

subtitles.original: さあ笑って泣いてそんな毎日を
subtitles.english: So, laughing and crying through those days,

subtitles.original: 歩いていくんだいついつまでも
subtitles.english: We'll keep walking together, forever and ever.

subtitles.original: 辛いこと痛いこともたくさんあるけど
subtitles.english: There are many painful and hurtful things, but...

subtitles.original: この世界はいつでもどこでも音楽で溢れてる
subtitles.english: This world is always, everywhere, overflowing with music.

subtitles.original: 目の前のことも将来のことも不安になってどうしたらいいの
subtitles.english: Anxious about what's in front of me and the future, what should I do?

subtitles.original: 分からなくって迷うこともあるけど
subtitles.english: There are times I'm lost and don't know the way, but...

subtitles.original: そんな時もきっとあなたがいてくれれば 前を向けるんだ
subtitles.english: Even then, I'm sure if you're there, I can look forward.

subtitles.original: こんな気持ちになるのは こんな想いができるのは
subtitles.english: The reason I feel this way, the reason I can have these thoughts,

subtitles.original: きっと音楽だけなんだ
subtitles.english: Is surely only because of music.

subtitles.original: 終わらないひとつもないんです
subtitles.english: There's not a single thing that doesn't end.

subtitles.original: どうか1000年先も どうか鳴り止まないで
subtitles.english: Please, even 1000 years from now, please don't stop ringing.

subtitles.original: いつも本当にありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you truly for everything.

subtitles.original: 君が持ってきたならば
subtitles.english: If you were the one who brought it,

subtitles.original:
花の塔
作詞・作曲 さユり
subtitles.english:
Flower Tower
Lyrics & Composition: Sayuri

subtitles.original: くれた知らない名前のお花
subtitles.english: The flower with a name I didn't know that you gave me.

subtitles.original: 今日はまだ来ないかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if it's not coming yet today,

subtitles.original: 初めての感情知ってしまった
subtitles.english: I've come to know a feeling for the first time.

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った絵画も覗いて一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Looking at the paintings by the window, traveling through space alone,

subtitles.original: それだけでいいはずだったのに
subtitles.english: That should have been enough, and yet...

subtitles.original: 君の手を握ってしまったら
subtitles.english: Once I ended up holding your hand,

subtitles.original: 孤独を知らないこの街には
subtitles.english: To this town that doesn't know loneliness,

subtitles.original: もう二度と帰ってくることはできないのでしょう
subtitles.english: I probably can't ever return again.

subtitles.original: 君が手を差し伸べた 光で影が生まれる
subtitles.english: You reached out your hand, and light gives birth to shadows.

subtitles.original: 歌って聴かせて この話の続き
subtitles.english: Sing to me, tell me the continuation of this story,

subtitles.original: 連れてって 見たことない星まで
subtitles.english: Take me away, to a star I've never seen before.

subtitles.original: 誰もここへも届かない 高く聳え立ったこの塔で
subtitles.english: Where no one can reach, in this tower standing tall and high,

subtitles.original: 飛ばす風船 僕は君に笑ってほしいの
subtitles.english: Releasing balloons, I want you to smile.

subtitles.original: 満たされないまま 聖域の合間を濡らした体温で
subtitles.english: With an unfulfilled heart, with a body temperature that wetted the sanctuary gaps,

subtitles.original: これまでは埋めてきたけれど
subtitles.english: I've been filling it up until now, but...

subtitles.original: 退屈な日々を蹴散らして 君と二人でこの街中を
subtitles.english: Kicking away the boring days, if the two of us through this town...

subtitles.original: 泳ぎきったら それはどれだけ素敵なことでしょう
subtitles.english: Managed to swim through, how wonderful would that be?

subtitles.original: 出したことないほど大きな声で
subtitles.english: With a voice louder than I've ever produced,

subtitles.original: やっと君に伝わる
subtitles.english: It finally reaches you.

subtitles.original: 歪な空が咲き ちょっといいな
subtitles.english: A distorted sky blooms, it's kinda nice,

subtitles.original: 世界の端と端を結んで
subtitles.english: Connecting the edges of the world.

subtitles.original: 窓に飾った絵画も覗いて一人で宇宙を旅して
subtitles.english: Looking at the paintings by the window, traveling through space alone,

subtitles.original: それだけで不自由ないけれど
subtitles.english: I have no inconveniences with just that, but...

subtitles.original: 僕ら選んでみたみたい 儚い心 傷だらけの空を
subtitles.english: It seems we've tried choosing a transient heart and a sky full of wounds.
